SummonerBarrier.name: Barrier
SummonerBarrier.description: Shields your champion from 115-455 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.

SummonerPoroRecall.name: To the King!
SummonerPoroRecall.description: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.

SummonerBoost.name: Cleanse
SummonerBoost.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.

SummonerDarkStarChampSelect2.name: Disabled Summoner Spells
SummonerDarkStarChampSelect2.description: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.

SummonerTeleport.name: Teleport
SummonerTeleport.description: After channeling for 4.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.

SummonerDarkStarChampSelect1.name: Disabled Summoner Spells
SummonerDarkStarChampSelect1.description: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.

SummonerFlash.name: Flash
SummonerFlash.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

SummonerSnowball.name: Mark
SummonerSnowball.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.

SummonerHeal.name: Heal
SummonerHeal.description: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

SummonerMana.name: Clarity
SummonerMana.description: Restores 50% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 25% of their maximum Mana.

SummonerPoroThrow.name: Poro Toss
SummonerPoroThrow.description: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.

SummonerSmite.name: Smite
SummonerSmite.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic or large monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.

SummonerSiegeChampSelect1.name: Nexus Siege: Siege Weapon Slot
SummonerSiegeChampSelect1.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!

SummonerSiegeChampSelect2.name: Nexus Siege: Siege Weapon Slot
SummonerSiegeChampSelect2.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!

SummonerExhaust.name: Exhaust
SummonerExhaust.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed by 30%, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

SummonerDot.name: Ignite
SummonerDot.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.

SummonerHaste.name: Ghost
SummonerHaste.description: Your champion gains increased Movement Speed and can move through units for 10 seconds. Grants a maximum of 28-45% (depending on champion level) Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.
